sentence.romaji: koko ha tennen no onsen desu
sentence.english: This is a natural hot spring.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ten

sentence.kanji: 天から恵みの雨が降ったね。
sentence.romaji: ten kara megumi no ame ga futa ne
sentence.english: A welcome rain fell from the skies.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's korogasu

sentence.kanji: まず、肉をパン粉の上で転がします。
sentence.romaji: mazu niku wo panko no ue de korogashimasu
sentence.english: First of all, roll the meat in bread crumbs.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's itai

sentence.kanji: この辺一帯はリンゴ畑です。
sentence.romaji: kono hen itai ha ringobatake desu
sentence.english: The whole area here is apple orchards.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's niou

sentence.kanji: バラの花が甘く匂っているね。
sentence.romaji: bara no hana ga amaku niote iru ne
sentence.english: Rose flowers smell sweet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's abura

sentence.kanji: この肉は脂が多い。
sentence.romaji: kono niku ha abura ga ooi
sentence.english: This meat is fatty.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's maku

sentence.kanji: ステージの幕が上がったんだ。
sentence.romaji: sute-ji no maku ga agata n da
sentence.english: The stage curtain rose.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's nuno

sentence.kanji: この布はカーテンに使えます。
sentence.romaji: kono nuno ha ka-ten ni tsukaemasu
sentence.english: This cloth can be used for curtains.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shimo

sentence.kanji: 今朝は庭の草に霜が降りていたの。
sentence.romaji: kesa ha niwa no kusa ni shimo ga orite ita no
sentence.english: There was frost on the grass in the garden this morning.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jidou

sentence.kanji: ここは児童の通学路です。
sentence.romaji: koko ha jidou no tsuugakuro desu
sentence.english: This is a school route for children.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's korogaru

sentence.kanji: 猫は砂の上で転がったんだ。
sentence.romaji: neko ha suna no ue de korogata n da
sentence.english: The cat rolled over on the sand.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's saru

sentence.kanji: 山で猿の親子を見ました。
sentence.romaji: yama de saru no oyako wo mimashita
sentence.english: I saw a female monkey and her child in the mountains.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shou

sentence.kanji: この本の第6章が特に好きです。
sentence.romaji: kono hon no dairokushou ga tokuni suki desu
sentence.english: I especially like Chapter 6 of this book.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mokuji

sentence.kanji: 読みたい章を目次で探しました。
sentence.romaji: yomitai shou wo mokuji de sagashimashita
sentence.english: I looked for the chapter that I wanted to read in the table of contents.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shigai

sentence.kanji: 祖父は市外の病院に通っているの。
sentence.romaji: sofu ha shigai no byouin ni kayote iru no
sentence.english: My grandfather goes to a hospital outside the city.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tennou

sentence.kanji: 日本には天皇がいます。
sentence.romaji: nipon ni ha tennou ga imasu
sentence.english: Japan has an emperor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ume

sentence.kanji: 梅の花が咲きました。
sentence.romaji: ume no hana ga sakimashita
sentence.english: Plum blossoms bloomed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tsuyuake

sentence.kanji: 梅雨明けは来週だそうです。
sentence.romaji: tsuyuake ha raishuu da sou desu
sentence.english: I heard that the rainy season will be over next week.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kosame

sentence.kanji: 小雨なので傘はいりません。
sentence.romaji: kosame na no de kasa ha irimasen
sentence.english: I don't need an umbrella as it is only drizzling.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's akirameru

sentence.kanji: 彼は留学の夢を諦めていないよ。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ryuugaku no yume wo akiramete inai yo
sentence.english: He hasn't given up his dream of studying abroad.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shoubai

sentence.kanji: 彼の商売は儲かっているな。
sentence.romaji: kare no shoubai ha moukate iru na
sentence.english: His business is profitable.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaki

sentence.kanji: 庭に柿の実がなりました。
sentence.romaji: niwa ni kaki no mi ga narimashita
sentence.english: The persimmon in the garden has born fruit.

cards.english: first shrine visit of the new year
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hatsumoude

sentence.kanji: 近くの神社に初詣でに行きました。
sentence.romaji: chikaku no jinja ni hatsumoude ni ikimashita
sentence.english: We paid a new year's visit to the nearby Shinto shrine.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sasaru

sentence.kanji: 靴の底に釘が刺さってしまったんだ。
sentence.romaji: kutsu no soko ni kugi ga sasate shimata n da
sentence.english: A nail has stuck in the bottom of my shoe.
